com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers

Class AdvancedImpl<DATATYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.ParameterizableImpl
      • com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers.AbstractStyler
        • com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers.AdvancedImpl<DATATYPE>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPCellEvent, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPTableEvent, com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.Parameterizable, DocumentAware, LayerManagerAware, BaseStyler, Advanced<DATATYPE>, Cloneable, Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractPositioning, DebugStyler, Page, Shadow, SimpleColumns, Underline

    public class AdvancedImpl<DATATYPE>
extends AbstractStyler
implements Advanced<DATATYPE>, LayerManagerAware
    an advanced styler for directly drawing on a canvas, can be used from setup in two ways: draw (conditionally) on each page, draw after a certain Chunk is drawn. Subclasses that can create elements can as well be used in combination with the ElementProducer methods to add elements to the document. Furthermore an advanced styler can be used programmatically, use the constructor with arguments for this and the draw(com.itextpdf.text.Rectangle, java.lang.String) method. Like all stylers setup of these stylers can be done from properties, see AbstractStyler.setup(java.util.Map, java.util.Map) }.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl

      • setup

        public void setup(Map<String,String> args,
         Map<String,String> settings)
        Description copied from class: AbstractStyler
        initialize a styler from defaults or arguments. Defaults are searched in properties using the concatenation of Class.getSimpleName(), a "." and the name of a setting for the styler. Subclasses of AbstractStyler will be searched starting with the actual class, ending with the direct subclass of AbstractStyler.
        Specified by:
        setup in interface com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.Parameterizable
        Overrides:
        setup in class AbstractStyler

      • cellLayout

        public final void cellLayout(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPCell cell,
              com.itextpdf.text.Rectangle position,
              com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfContentByte[] canvases)
        Calls draw(com.itextpdf.text.Rectangle, java.lang.String) with null as genericTag, when USEPADDING is true, calculate a rectangle taking padding into account before calling draw(com.itextpdf.text.Rectangle, java.lang.String). When isBg() is true PdfPTable.BASECANVAS is used for drawing, otherwise PdfPTable.TEXTCANVAS.
        Specified by:
        cellLayout in interface com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPCellEvent
        Parameters:
        cell -
        position -
        canvases -
